Ways to use Zepel with Teams

Building and shipping quality features requires teams to come together and work.

Here are multiple ways of how you can bring members from every team together, collaborate, and ship on time.

Use cases for teams

Project Management

Learn how you can manage your project from start to finish in Zepel.

Build Features Together

Work together with Developers, Designers, and QA team.

Prioritize Features

Product managers use Zepel to plan and prioritize their next features.

Manage Workload

Track what each member is working on and manage their workload.

Use cases based on roles

Product Manager

Learn how you can manage your project from start to finish in Zepel.

Engineering Manager

Work together with Developers, Designers, and QA team.

Developer

Engineering teams use Zepel to file, track, and fix bugs.
